answers.answer: This is probably a thin area of sclera.  The color is due to the dark choroid showing the the thinner sclera.  This can be related to age or high myopia.Dr.O.

question: Lately my eyes have been getting red and have been quite irritated.  I have diabetes and high blood pressure.  A couple of weeks ago I noticed a blue circular spot to the left of my pupil on the white part of my left eyeball.  Is this something to be concerned about?  What might it be?
title: Blue spot on eyeball
